subsection.name: Version Tag
subsection.p: A version tag may be declared in either a class or interface. It specifices the version of the component or service (depeding if the tag is included within a class or interface). The presence of a version tag signals to the generation tools that a meta-info description is required. In the case of a class, a Type defintion is created whereas an version tag in an interface will result in the generation of a Service descriptor.
